description: A rebel army of nearly two million warriors led by Koza, fighting against King Cobra and the Arabasta royal government. Based in Katorea, the rebels believe the king is responsible for the drought affecting the kingdom through the use of Dance Powder.

keyMoments.title: Rebel Base Revealed
keyMoments.description: The rebel army's headquarters in Katorea is shown, revealing a large organized force operating from a compound of tents.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the scale and organization of the rebellion threatening Arabasta.

keyMoments.title: Koza Leads Rebels
keyMoments.description: Koza is revealed as the leader of the rebel army, declaring their intent to change Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the rebellion's leadership and their determination to overthrow the current government.

statusHistory.reason: Actively fighting against the royal government

goals.reason: Belief that the king is using Dance Powder to cause drought
Save the kingdom from the drought crisis
